name: The Rising of the Rose Ocelot
description: THE RISING OF THE ROSE OCELOT! The BOMBASTIC Adventure story of a hero who is tasked with saving the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2 GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2 GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 300 MB available space
